entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
